author: Special Correspondent
title: Palamuru residents urged not to return now
description: Those working in other states asked to stay there till lockdown was lifted
content: In a bid to control the spread of coronavirus spread in the district, particularly with those of the district staying outside and returning, the administration of Mahabubnagar has made a unique appeal to all the non-residents of Mahabubnagar, those living in … [+977 chars]
